headline: Chevron Advances Global Workforce Reduction Plan With Texas Layoffs
summary: CVX to lay off nearly 200 Texas workers in July as part of a global workforce cut of up to 20% by 2026, to reduce costs and streamline its operations.

headline: Energy Transition Today - Plexar Energy Advances Industrial Microgrid Solutions for Sustainability
summary: Copenhagen Infrastructure Partners and PensionDanmark have established Plexar Energy, a new company specializing in microgrids to advance the industrialization of renewable energy systems. This initiative seeks to capitalize on the increasing demand for microgrids, which promise faster electrification and energy independence for industries. Supported by the CI Microgrid Electrification Fund, Plexar Energy aims to provide cost-effective, grid-integrated solutions that cater to industries such...

headline: Venezuela's oil exports stable as buyers in China receive more
summary: The U.S. Treasury and State departments in March revoked the authorizations they had granted in recent years for PDVSA's customers and partners to export oil from sanctioned Venezuela.  The license expirations and PDVSA cancelling some cargoes to one of its main partners, Chevron, due to payment uncertainties, reduced deliveries to the state company's traditional customers in the U.S. and Europe.
